name: Jewels Fantasy
description:
Jewels is a cool and easy to play match-3 games.
How to Play:
- Swap the jewels to match 3 in a line.
- Match more than 3 to make special jewels.
- Create extra time jewels for each combo-3 or higher in Action mode. Each extra time jewel gives 5s more in a game.
Features
- Global, cross-platform leaderboards.
- Beautiful graphics, and simple gameplay.
- Two play modes: Classic & Action and others in near future.

Lets explore the jewels world by yourself.

Keep connecting with us!
